ComicInfo.Summary: Bloodhounds; (Sanctuary Book Three: Guild War - Chapter Five): When a prostitute is murdered by serial killer, old man downstairs who comes up to complain about the noise is arrested. Meanwhile Lusiphur prepares for the assault on the Eye of Lin Assassin's Guild.
